text: Top notch pizza!  Crust is the perfect combo of chewy and crispy and the sauce is amazing. We got the meat lovers pie. Can't wait to try more.
best pizza and hoagies in bellevue.  delicious crust and bread. the ricotta pizza is my favorite.  you cant get these types of specialty pizza's anywhere around here.  hope they stick around!

I have eaten at Nicola several times and I love the food. Very authentic Italian Pasta, sauces, bread, pizza, and the best cheese-steak hoagies I have ever had!  Very good meatballs and sausage, too. Absolutely delicious. The owner and chef are very warm friendly people. They make me and my family feel at home in their restaurant. About once a week we get take out and it's worth it. Reasonable prices for generous portions.  Reminds me of my Italian Grandmother's food. I love it. Highly recommended.
